synopsis.text: Production's newest idols, each with their own unique aspirations, unite under the dazzling stage lights. Mirai Kasuga, a young woman on a quest for purpose, discovers her passion for idol performance at a concert and decides to chase her newfound dream. Shizuka Mogami, a gifted singer held back by her strict family, finds the courage to pursue her idol ambitions with Mirai's encouragement. Tsubasa Ibuki, an amateur model with a carefree spirit, joins the duo to complete the trio of idols-in-the-making. As they embark on their journey to stardom, they are joined by 36 other hopefuls at 765 Production. Witness the captivating tale of these idols as they bring their dreams to life in 'The IDOLM@STER Million Live!!', which premiered in Japan in August 2023 and began its regular broadcast in October 2023. Prepare to be swept away by the dazzling spectacle of their combined talents and the radiant colors of their dreams.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
